games.name: Forza Horizon 4
games.description: Dynamic seasons change everything in the world’s greatest automotive festival. Go it alone or team up to explore beautiful and historic Britain.

games.name: Forza Horizon 5
games.description: Explore the vibrant and ever-evolving landscapes of Mexico with limitless, fun driving action in hundreds of the world’s greatest cars.

games.name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
games.description: Race your friends or battle them in a revamped Battle mode on new and returning battle courses.

games.name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted
games.description: Outrun the cops, outdrive your friends, and outsmart your rivals in the most dangerous street racing game yet.

games.name: Gran Turismo 7
games.description: From classic cars to the latest supercars, experience the thrill of racing in a variety of stunning locations.

games.name: F1 23
games.description: The official Formula 1 game with updated teams, circuits, and realistic driving physics. Compete for the championship!

games.name: Burnout Paradise Remastered
games.description: The ultimate driving playground with high-speed races, stunts, and crashes. Remastered for modern consoles.

games.name: Dirt Rally 2.0
games.description: A realistic rally simulation with challenging tracks, dynamic weather, and a wide range of rally cars.

games.name: Trackmania Turbo
games.description: A fast-paced arcade racing game with over 200 tracks, split-screen multiplayer, and a track editor.

games.name: Wipeout Omega Collection
games.description: A high-speed anti-gravity racing game with futuristic ships, stunning visuals, and adrenaline-pumping tracks.

games.name: Wii Sports
games.description: Enjoy a variety of sports games that use intuitive motion controls to mimic real sports like tennis, bowling, and baseball.

games.name: UFC 4
games.description: Shape your fighter and your legacy in the dynamic UFC universe. Train, fight, and rise to the top.

games.name: FIFA 23
games.description: The ultimate football simulation experience with updated teams, hypermotion gameplay, and more realistic animations.

games.name: NBA 2K23
games.description: Play as your favorite basketball legends or create your own team in the most realistic basketball simulator to date.

games.name: Rugby 22
games.description: Play as the best rugby teams in this dynamic and challenging rugby simulator with advanced gameplay mechanics.

games.name: Madden NFL 23
games.description: The latest installment in the Madden NFL series, featuring updated rosters, improved gameplay mechanics, and realistic animations.

games.name: MLB The Show 23
games.description: The definitive baseball simulation game with updated rosters, realistic gameplay, and a variety of modes to enjoy.

games.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2
games.description: A remastered collection of the first two Tony Hawk games, featuring updated graphics, controls, and all the original levels.

games.name: PGA Tour 2K23
games.description: The ultimate golf simulation game with realistic courses, professional players, and a robust career mode.

games.name: WWE 2K23
games.description: The latest installment in the WWE series, featuring updated rosters, improved gameplay, and a variety of match types.

games.name: Elden Ring
games.description: Explore a vast and treacherous world full of mythical creatures, powerful enemies, and secrets to uncover in this action RPG.

games.name: Dark Souls III
games.description: Battle through dark and gothic landscapes while facing relentless foes and uncovering the mystery of the fading embers.

games.name: Dark Souls II
games.description: Dive into a brutal world filled with cryptic lore and formidable enemies in the second installment of the Dark Souls series.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto V
games.description: Experience the lives of three criminals as they pursue wealth and power in the sprawling open-world city of Los Santos.

games.name: Fallout 4
games.description: Venture through a post-apocalyptic wasteland filled with mutants, factions, and choices that define your survival.

games.name: Ghost of Tsushima
games.description: In the late 13th century, the Mongol empire has laid waste to entire nations along their campaign to conquer the East. Tsushima Island is all that stands between.

games.name: Starfield
games.description: Starfield is the first new universe in 25 years from Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and Fallout 4.

games.name: Horizon Forbidden West
games.description: Explore a post-apocalyptic world overrun by robotic creatures. Uncover secrets and fight to save humanity.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: Lead your Viking clan to glory in 9th-century England. Raid, build settlements, and forge alliances.

games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: Explore the kingdom of Hyrule in this reimagined open-world adventure. Solve puzzles, fight enemies, and uncover secrets.

games.name: It Takes Two
games.description: A cooperative adventure where two players must work together to overcome a variety of challenges and save a broken relationship.

games.name: God of War
games.description: Embark on a journey with Kratos and his son Atreus in this action-packed adventure inspired by Norse mythology.

games.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: Follow Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, as he searches for his missing adopted daughter in a richly detailed fantasy world.

games.name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
games.description: Sail the high seas as Edward Kenway, a pirate and assassin, in a story of betrayal, plunder, and the fight for freedom.

games.name: Alan Wake
games.description: Step into the shoes of a troubled writer as he unravels a mystery shrouded in darkness in this psychological thriller.

games.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: An epic tale of life in America’s unforgiving heartland. Follow Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang as they struggle to survive.

games.name: The Last of Us Part II
games.description: A gripping story of revenge and redemption in a post-apocalyptic world. Follow Ellie on her journey through danger and despair.

games.name: Horizon Zero Dawn
games.description: Explore a post-apocalyptic world overrun by robotic creatures. Uncover the secrets of the past and fight to save humanity.

games.name: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
games.description: Join Nathan Drake on his final adventure as he searches for lost treasure and confronts his past.

games.name: Life is Strange: True Colors
games.description: A narrative-driven adventure where Alex Chen uses her supernatural empathy to uncover the truth behind her brother’s death.

games.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 3
games.description: A futuristic first-person shooter with a gripping campaign, competitive multiplayer, and an extensive Zombies mode.

games.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2
games.description: A groundbreaking Call of Duty game featuring branching storylines, futuristic weapons, and intense multiplayer modes.

games.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops
games.description: A gritty, Cold War-era shooter with a captivating campaign, beloved multiplayer, and the start of the Zombies phenomenon.

games.name: XDefiant
games.description: A free-to-play arena shooter combining fast-paced gunplay with faction-based abilities inspired by Ubisoft franchises.

games.name: Halo Infinite
games.description: Step into the boots of Master Chief and take on a new enemy in this expansive and visually stunning sci-fi shooter.

games.name: Valorant
games.description: A tactical 5v5 character-based shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Free-to-play and highly competitive.

games.name: Counter-Strike 2
games.description: The next evolution of CS:GO. Experience modernized gameplay, realistic smoke mechanics, and upgraded visuals.

games.name: Call of Duty
games.description: Call of Duty delivers the gritty realism and cinematic intensity of World War II's epic battlefield moments like never before - through the eyes of citizen soldiers.

games.name: Overwatch 2
games.description: A team-based hero shooter with 5v5 battles, new maps, and dynamic PvP modes. Free-to-play with seasonal content.

games.name: Doom Eternal
games.description: Rip and tear through hordes of demons in this ultra-fast-paced FPS. Master brutal combat and save humanity from Hell’s invasion.

games.name: League of Legends
games.description: El MOBA más popular del mundo. Elige entre más de 160 campeones, destruye el nexo enemigo y domina las clasificatorias.

games.name: Dota 2
games.description: El rival directo de LoL, famoso por su complejidad estratégica y el torneo más lucrativo del mundo: The International.

games.name: Smite
games.description: MOBA en tercera persona donde controlas dioses mitológicos. ¡Combate en arenas épicas con habilidades divinas!

games.name: Heroes of the Storm
games.description: Combina héroes de universos como Warcraft, Diablo y StarCraft en un MOBA con objetivos dinámicos en el mapa.

games.name: Arena of Valor
games.description: El MOBA móvil más jugado en Asia. Partidas rápidas de 10 minutos y héroes inspirados en la cultura pop.

games.name: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang
games.description: Rival directo de Arena of Valor. Conquista el mapa en partidas 5v5 diseñadas para móviles.

games.name: Pokémon Unite
games.description: MOBA de Pokémon donde capturas puntos de zona en lugar de destruir torres. ¡Atrapa a todos!

games.name: Wild Rift
games.description: La versión móvil y consola de League of Legends, optimizada para partidas rápidas y controles táctiles.

games.name: Onmyoji Arena
games.description: MOBA inspirado en el folclore japonés, con personajes basados en espíritus y criaturas mitológicas.

games.name: Eternal Return: Black Survival
games.description: Combina elementos de Battle Royale y MOBA en un escenario isométrico con supervivencia y crafting.

games.name: World of Warcraft
games.description: El rey de los MMO. Explora Azeroth, enfréntate a dragones ancestrales y participa en raids épicas con millones de jugadores.

games.name: Final Fantasy XIV
games.description: Un MMO con una historia cinematográfica, combate por turnos táctico y una comunidad apasionada. ¡El renacimiento de una leyenda!

games.name: Guild Wars 2
games.description: MMO sin suscripción con eventos mundiales dinámicos, combate fluido y un enfoque en la exploración horizontal.

games.name: The Elder Scrolls Online
games.description: Explora Tamriel a tu ritmo, desde Morrowind hasta Skyrim, en este MMO basado en la saga de RPGs de Bethesda.

games.name: Black Desert Online
games.description: MMO de acción con un sistema de combate sin tab-targeting, gráficos deslumbrantes y un enfoque en la economía jugador a jugador.

games.name: Lost Ark
games.description: MMOARPG coreano con combate isométrico, dungeons masivas y una campaña épica de fantasía oscura.

games.name: Star Wars: The Old Republic
games.description: MMO ambientado en la era de los Sith y los Jedi, con historias cinematográficas basadas en elecciones morales.

games.name: RuneScape
games.description: El MMO más longevo con un mundo persistente, habilidades para entrenar y una comunidad legendaria.

games.name: New World
games.description: MMO de supervivencia en un mundo colonial fantástico con combate basado en habilidades y conquista de territorios.

games.name: Destiny 2
games.description: MMO-FPS híbrido con incursiones cooperativas, PvP competitivo y una narrativa expansiva en un universo de ciencia ficción.

games.name: Fortnite
games.description: El Battle Royale más popular del mundo. Construye, dispara y baila en un mapa que cambia constantemente con eventos en vivo.

games.name: PUBG: Battlegrounds
games.description: El juego que popularizó el género Battle Royale. Sobrevive en un mapa que se reduce progresivamente y sé el último en pie.

games.name: Apex Legends
games.description: Combina habilidades únicas de personajes con un gunplay preciso en este BR de ritmo frenético y mecánicas innovadoras.

games.name: Call of Duty: Warzone
games.description: BR gratuito de Call of Duty con mapas enormes, combate táctico y modos como Resurgence y Plunder.

games.name: Fall Guys: Ultimate Knockout
games.description: Un Battle Royale caótico y divertido donde compites en minijuegos absurdos para ser el último frijol en pie.

games.name: Naraka: Bladepoint
games.description: BR de acción cuerpo a cuerpo con combate rápido, parkour y un enfoque en la habilidad individual.

games.name: Spellbreak
games.description: BR mágico donde los jugadores lanzan hechizos elementales y combinan poderes para dominar el campo de batalla.

games.name: Hyper Scape
games.description: BR futurista con mecánicas de parkour, armas exóticas y eventos en vivo que cambian el rumbo de la partida.

games.name: Realm Royale
games.description: BR fantástico con clases, forja de armas y monturas. Sobrevive en un mundo lleno de magia y peligros.

games.name: Super Animal Royale
games.description: BR adorable con animales antropomórficos, armas locas y un estilo visual pixelado único.

games.name: Super Mario Bros.
games.description: El juego que definió los plataformas. Ayuda a Mario a rescatar a la Princesa Peach de las garras de Bowser en el Reino Champiñón.

games.name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
games.description: Una aventura épica en Hyrule donde Link debe recuperar la Trifuerza y derrotar a Ganon. Un clásico de SNES.

games.name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
games.description: El erizo azul más rápido del mundo regresa con Tails para derrotar al Dr. Robotnik y salvar el planeta.

games.name: Street Fighter II
games.description: El juego que revolucionó los juegos de lucha. Elige entre 8 luchadores y demuestra tus habilidades en combates 1v1.

games.name: Pac-Man
games.description: El clásico juego de laberintos donde Pac-Man debe comer todos los puntos mientras evita a los fantasmas.

games.name: Donkey Kong Country
games.description: DK y Diddy Kong se embarcan en una aventura para recuperar sus bananas robadas por el malvado King K. Rool.

games.name: Mega Man 2
games.description: El clásico de acción y plataformas donde Mega Man debe derrotar a los Robot Masters del Dr. Wily.

games.name: Tetris
games.description: El juego de puzzles más icónico de la historia. Acomoda bloques y evita que lleguen a la parte superior.

games.name: Final Fantasy VI
games.description: Una obra maestra del RPG con una historia épica, personajes memorables y un villano icónico: Kefka.

games.name: Chrono Trigger
games.description: Un RPG innovador con viajes en el tiempo, múltiples finales y un elenco de personajes inolvidables.

games.name: Half-Life: Alyx
games.description: Una experiencia de VR revolucionaria que lleva la narrativa y el combate inmersivo a un nuevo nivel. Ambientado en el universo de Half-Life.

games.name: Beat Saber
games.description: Un juego de ritmo en VR donde cortas bloques al compás de la música con sables de luz. ¡Adictivo y divertido!

games.name: Superhot VR
games.description: El tiempo solo avanza cuando tú te mueves. Un shooter en VR con un estilo visual minimalista y mecánicas únicas.

games.name: The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners
games.description: Un survival horror en VR ambientado en el universo de The Walking Dead. Toma decisiones difíciles y lucha por sobrevivir.

games.name: Boneworks
games.description: Un juego de física avanzada en VR donde interactúas con el mundo de manera realista. Combate, resuelve puzzles y explora.

games.name: Pistol Whip
games.description: Un shooter rítmico en VR donde disparas al ritmo de la música mientras esquivas balas. ¡Pura acción y estilo!

games.name: Resident Evil 4 VR
games.description: El clásico de terror y acción reimaginado para VR. Ayuda a Leon S. Kennedy a rescatar a la hija del presidente.

games.name: Moss
games.description: Una aventura en VR donde controlas a Quill, un pequeño ratón valiente, en un mundo mágico lleno de puzzles y peligros.

games.name: VRChat
games.description: Un mundo virtual social donde puedes interactuar con otros jugadores, crear avatares personalizados y explorar mundos únicos.

games.name: Lone Echo
games.description: Una aventura espacial en VR con gráficos impresionantes y una narrativa envolvente. Flota en el espacio y resuelve misterios.
